headline: AG Brnovich announces first execution warrant issued across Arizona in eight years
author: Caleb J. Fernández
sentences: After earning his bachelor's degree from Pennsylvania State University in Advertising/Public Relations, Caleb went straight to New York City where he learned the necessities of production assistance, photography and art direction.
